flawed_nl_solution:
He spent 100*0.5=$100*0.5=50>>50 at the arcade.
He uses 50-10=$50-10=40>>40 on tokens
He can play 40/8=<<40/8=5>>5 hours
There are 60 minutes in an hour so he can play 5*60=<<5*60=3000>>3000 minutes
#### 3000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
